= Configuration parameters =

Add the following dependency to *plugin* section of your Maven project POM file:
{{{
    <plugins>
        ...

	<plugin>
		<groupId>com.fides</groupId>
		<artifactId>grinderplugin</artifactId>
		<version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
	</plugin>

        ...
    <\plugins>
}}}
You can configure *grinder properties file* and *jython test file* from both the local directory and POM file of your Maven project. 

The POM properties overwrites the same properties set in the local directory.

You can also configure optionals parameters from the POM file:

 * *daemon_option* -- the default value is FALSE. If you set TRUE the   agent goal run agent process with *-daemon* option;
 * *daemon_period* -- the default value is 60 seconds. If daemon_option is TRUE indicates the agent sleep time;

= Configure local directory =

 * Set the grinder property *grinder.jvm.classpath* with the absolute path of grinder.jar file;
   For example, *grinder.jvm.classpath = C:/grinder-3.6/lib/grinder.jar* 
 * Create src/test/config directory (if not exists) and copy grinder properties file;
 * Create src/test/jython directory (if not exists) and copy jython test file;
 * Set the optionals parameters, if you need; 

= Configure POM file =

 * Set the grinder property *grinder.jvm.classpath* with the absolute path of grinder.jar file;
   For example, *grinder.jvm.classpath = C:/grinder-3.6/lib/grinder.jar* 
 * Set *configuration* section of the grinderplugin dependency as followed:
{{{
    <plugin>
		<groupId>com.fides</groupId>
		<artifactId>grinderplugin</artifactId>
		<version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
                <configuration>
				<path>................</path>
				<pathTest>............</pathTest> 
				<daemon_option>.......</daemon_option>
				<daemon_period>.......</daemon_period>
				<properties>
				 .....
				</properties>
		</configuration>
    </plugin>
}}} 

 * *path*          -- absolute path of grinder properties file;
 * *pathTest*      -- absolute path of jython test directory;
 * *daemon_option* -- enable/disable agent daemon option (OPTIONAL);
 * *daemon_period* -- agent sleep time (OPTIONAL);
 * *properties*    -- list of grinder properties. You can set property as `<name_property>`value`<\name_property>`. 
For example, to set grinder property grinder.runs = 10, add line to *properties* section as followed:
{{{
     <properties>
	<grinder.runs>10<grinder.runs>
     </properties>
}}}
